Title: No internet connection
Body: Check your internet connection and try again.

Title: Login unsuccessful
Body: We were not able to log you into your account. Please check your credentials and try again.

Title: Automate your Key Results
Body: Track progress automatically with data-source insights.

Title: You're connected to Gtmhub
Body: You can now use SSO to log in.

Title: Password expires in 3 days
Body: Update your password to continue using Gtmhub.

Title: Upload error
Body: File is too large. Please use a file that is under 25MB.

Title: Upload error
Body: If you send email you may notify people who don't have access to the specific OKRs.

Title: Upload error
Body: If you send message in a Slack channel you may notify people who don't have access to the specific OKRs.

Title: Alignment cycle
Body: Some of your OKRs link to each other. You need to check the alignment links in the whiteboard and destroy any cycle.
There is another tag with the same name. If you decide to proceed they will be merged together. This action is irreversible!
